snippet.title: Let's Play Stonekeep 01: Introduction
snippet.description:
Well, here it is: my second Let's Play.

I know I might be dissapointing some people who seemed keen on me doing Lands of Lore 2, but I have been having a huge amount of problems getting that to work on my machine, as well as to record it effectively. Lands of Lore 2 most certainly is on the cards and will probably be the Let's Play after this one though. This game, however, is closer to my heart and is a game that I truly cherish and hopefully, one you will learn to cherish too.

Managed to make sure there wasn't any sound problems this time, simply by turning the master volume down. We'll see how this effects my mic performance, but I get the feeling a lot of my videos are going to be very large, file size.
